channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Hello i have yesterday set-up a Server with Hamachi and It runs very good but I need help with somethings
- How can i let NPC get drops? - How can i Talk with NpC? - and im stuck with some Tut
I have used some tuts and some of the tuts worked but some of them Not.. So if you can help please reply or add me on msn: Neon.glower@hotmail.com
Ps: If you can Script good and you helped me very good you can maybe be Mod or admin

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ninja Ninja
item.description:
@Ninja wrote:

I know there are tuts for all of those. But to make an NPC talk, go to NPChandler.java search for Moo. Above moo it should say something like ifNPCtype = . change that npc number to whatever npc you want to talk. Then down where it says “Moo” change the text inside the quotations to w/e you want it to say.
NOTE: you may copy and paste that whole thing to make different NPCs say different things.

Read full topic
